name: Briefcase
description:
Incarnate a Briefcase Management Officer in its everyday job.

Handle all the resources inputed and outputed by the different elements in the briefcase. But your client is a bit special, he had the (not so) great idea to place all of his internal organs in the aforementionned receptacle, beware not to bring him to his ungodly end!

A deliberately obtuse game hiding several secret. Will you be able to uncover the terminal conundrum? No. Probably not.

Use the mouse to move items, and navigate panels,  escape to pause and the 1 and 2 keys to hide or show the two main panels.

Dualshock 4 supported.
